name: TRIAMCINOLONE ACETONIDE
warningsAndPrecautions: triamcinolone acetonide injectable suspension , usp off-white colored , aqueous suspension supplied vials providing 40 mg triamcinolone acetonide , usp per ml . 40 mg/ml , 1 ml : 1 single-dose vial 1 caron ndc 67457-621-02 25 single-dose vials 1 carton ndc 67457-621-99 40 mg/ml , 5ml 1 multiple-dose vial ( 200 mg/5ml ) 1 carton ndc 67457-622-05 25 multiple-dose vials ( 200 mg/5ml ) 1 carton ndc 67457-622-99 40 mg/ml , 10 ml 1 multiple-dose vial ( 400 mg/10 ml ) 1 carton ndc 67457-623-10 25 multiple-dose vials ( 400 mg/10 ml ) 1 carton ndc 67457-623-99 storage store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect temperatures 20°c ( 68°f ) . refrigerate . store vial carton protect light . store vial upright . manufactured : mylan institutional llc morgantown , wv 26505 u.s.a. manufactured : mylan laboratories limited bangalore , india 50104589 march 2025
adverseReactions: triamcinolone acetonide injectable suspension contraindicated patients hypersensitive components product ( : general ) . intramuscular corticosteroid preparations contraindicated idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura .
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Triamcinolone Acetonide Injectable Suspension, USP is an off-white colored, aqueous suspension and is supplied in vials providing 40 mg triamcinolone acetonide, USP per mL.
                  
                     
                     
                     
                        
                           
                              
                                 40 mg/mL, 1 mL:
                              
                           
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              1 Single-Dose Vial in 1 Caron
                           
                           
                              NDC 67457-621-02
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              25 Single-Dose Vials in 1 Carton 
                           
                           
                              NDC 67457-621-99
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              
                                  
                              
                              
                                 40 mg/mL, 5mL
                              
                           
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              1 Multiple-Dose Vial (200 mg/5mL) in 1 Carton
                           
                           
                              NDC 67457-622-05
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              25 Multiple-Dose Vials (200 mg/5mL) in 1 Carton
                           
                           
                              NDC 67457-622-99
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              
                                  
                              
                              
                                  40 mg/mL, 10 mL
                              
                           
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              1 Multiple-Dose Vial (400 mg/10 mL) in 1 Carton
                           
                           
                              NDC 67457-623-10
                           
                        
                        
                           
                              25 Multiple-Dose Vials (400 mg/10 mL) in 1 Carton
                           
                           
                              NDC 67457-623-99
                           
                        
                     
                  
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Protect from temperatures below 20°C (68°F). Do not refrigerate. Store vial in carton to protect from light. Store vial upright.
                  Manufactured for:
                     Mylan Institutional LLC
                     Morgantown, WV 26505 U.S.A.
                  Manufactured by:
                     Mylan Laboratories Limited
                     Bangalore, India
                  50104589   MARCH 2025
adverseReactions_original:
Triamcinolone acetonide injectable suspension is contraindicated in patients who are hypersensitive to any components of this product (see 
                        WARNINGS: General
                     ).
                  Intramuscular corticosteroid preparations are contraindicated for idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura.
